/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different colors are scattered across the street, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows that add depth to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
